alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Marshall; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 10:50AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN GUERNSEY...MONROE... SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...NOBLE...EASTERN HARRISON...JEFFERSON...EASTERN COLUMBIANA...BELMONT...BEAVER...VENANGO...BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN ALLEGHENY...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG... CLARION...FOREST...EASTERN MERCER...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON... LAWRENCE...OHIO...NORTHWESTERN WETZEL...MARSHALL...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 1049 AM EST, radar indicated showers were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Titusville to near Caldwell. Movement was east at 50 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be follwed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Ross Township, Wheeling, McCandless Township, Cranberry, Moon Township, New Castle, Weirton, Steubenville, Butler, Franklin Park, and East Liverpool. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.
